forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
